class.name: GodotIKConstraint
class.brief_description: Abstract base class for IK constraints.
class.description: GodotIKConstraint provides a base for creating custom constraints that affect bone behavior in an IK chain. It must be attached as a direct child of a [GodotIKEffector] node. The method [method apply] must be overridden in subclasses to adjust bone positions according to the constraint.

method.name: apply
method.description: Adjusts bone positions in an IK chain according to the constraint. All parameter positions and expected returned positions are in the skeleton local space. Parameters: - [param pos_parent_bone]: The parent bone's position. - [param pos_bone]: The current bone's position. - [param pos_child_bone]: The child bone's position. - [param chain_direction]: The direction along the IK chain, using [enum GodotIKConstraint.FORWARD] or [enum GodotIKConstraint.BACKWARD]. Returns a [code]PackedVector3Array[/code] with the positions [code][pos_parent_bone, pos_bone, pos_child_bone][/code].

method.name: get_skeleton
method.description: Returns the skeleton to which this constraint is attached to.

members.member: The index of the bone where the constraint applies.

signal.name: bone_idx_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the [member bone_idx] value changes.

constants.constant: Applies the constraint in the backward pass (from leaf to root).
Applies the constraint in the forward pass (from root to leaf).
